name: Krzysztof Nowak
story: Growing up in a poor family in rural Poland, Krzysztof saw the world as a place where only the strong and resourceful survived. He honed his skills at scavenging and looting as a means of survival, and eventually found his way into the Independent faction as a hired gun. Despite his sometimes cavalier attitude towards violence, he is careful not to bite off more than he can chew and always puts his own well-being first.
